movie.title: Orange
movie.description_intro: A girl receives a letter and upon opening and reading it finds a narration of the events of her day including the arrival of a transfer student suffering from challenges. The letter is from herself ten years in the future. She has advice for herself on friendship, school and life. This is the catalyst for her friend and her becoming better versions of themselves.
movie.description_full: A girl receives a letter and upon opening and reading it finds a narration of the events of her day including the arrival of a transfer student suffering from challenges. The letter is from herself ten years in the future. She has advice for herself on friendship, school and life. This is the catalyst for her friend and her becoming better versions of themselves.

movies.title: The Purifiers
movies.summary: The story of martial arts clubs who have created their own city infrastructure after tiring of government initiatives. Responding to the greed and corruption creeping into the other clubs, headed by capitalist-wannabe Moses, The Purifiers battle to maintain the successful system which has rid the city of crime and violence.
movies.description_full: The story of martial arts clubs who have created their own city infrastructure after tiring of government initiatives. Responding to the greed and corruption creeping into the other clubs, headed by capitalist-wannabe Moses, The Purifiers battle to maintain the successful system which has rid the city of crime and violence.

movies.title: Ivan's Childhood
movies.summary: During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information. Three Soviet officers try to take care of this boy-child.
movies.description_full: During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information. Three Soviet officers try to take care of this boy-child.
movies.synopsis: During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information. Three Soviet officers try to take care of this boy-child.

movies.title: Rabbit School - Guardians of the Golden Egg
movies.title_english: Rabbit School - Guardians of the Golden Egg
movies.title_long: Rabbit School - Guardians of the Golden Egg (2017)
movies.summary: Max, a cheeky city rabbit, winds up in an Easter rabbit school where time seems to have stood still. Thanks to training lessons from mysterious Madame Hermione and with the help of cute rabbit girl Emmi, he not only learns about the secret techniques of Easter bunnies but even more about himself when they have to fight a clever fox family that has been scheming to take over Easter.
movies.description_full: Max, a cheeky city rabbit, winds up in an Easter rabbit school where time seems to have stood still. Thanks to training lessons from mysterious Madame Hermione and with the help of cute rabbit girl Emmi, he not only learns about the secret techniques of Easter bunnies but even more about himself when they have to fight a clever fox family that has been scheming to take over Easter.

movies.title: Blood and Money
movies.summary: A retired veteran hunting in Northern Maine stumbles across a dead woman and a large sum of money.
movies.description_full: A retired veteran hunting in Northern Maine stumbles across a dead woman and a large sum of money.
movies.synopsis: A retired veteran hunting in Northern Maine stumbles across a dead woman and a large sum of money.
